member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SymbolOutputInfo
member.summary: Provides the basic information used for output a source code via an .
member.param: The type name of the type symbol.
The full type name of the type symbol.
The namespace name that the type symbol belongs to.
The generic parameter list if the type symbol contains the type parameters.
The generic parameter list without the constraints if the type symbol contains the type parameters.

The type kind of the type symbol. All possible type kinds are:
(Denotes as a keyword record)
Indicates whether the type symbol is a . If so, this property will keep the value as a modifier (i.e. keyword ) onto the members to implement.
Indicates whether the type symbol is a . If so, this property will keep the value as a modifier (i.e. keyword ) onto the parameters in methods.
Indicates whether the type symbol is a . If so, this property will keep the value as a nullable annotation ? onto the parameter types.
A value indicating whether the type is a generic type.
